```{r pkgs}
library(DALEX)
library(localModel)
library(randomForest)
data('apartments')

mrf <- randomForest(m2.price ~., data = apartments, ntree = 50)

explainer <- DALEX::explain(model = mrf,
                            data = apartmentsTest,
                            y = apartmentsTest$m2.price)

model_lok <- individual_surrogate_model(explainer, apartmentsTest[5, ],
                                        2000, n_points = 100,
                                        response_family = "gaussian")
plot(model_lok)
```
